mapper.select: select * from ( select aa.*, rownum rnum from ( select b.board_num, a.accnt_id, a.nickname, b.title, b.content, to_char(b.wdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') wdate from account a, board b where a.accnt_id = b.accnt_id order by b.board_num desc )aa ) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
select b.board_num, a.accnt_id, a.nickname, b.title, b.content, to_char(b.wdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') wdate from account a, board b where a.accnt_id = b.accnt_id and b.board_num = #{board_num}
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where board_num = #{board_num}
